InventoryID: Salerno, Sopr. Arch. 38132, from Avella (1981), T. 62 bis
Imagery Description: (a) Standing Dionysos, with piece of drapery over r. shoulder and l. arm, seated silen beside a pointed amphora, (b) Al + Br.
Additional Notes: The vase is close in style to nos. 384—5; cf. also with nos. 413^4 for the youths on the reverse.
